entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Clearing early this morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
